name: SquareGameBeat
description:
This game was made for the Wowie Game Jam 4.0. All sprites, the title, and all of the music was created using AI generators to fit the theme "Collaborate  with AI". This is my first game jam ever so feedback would be highly appreciated. 

CONTROLS

Movement- WASD or Arrow keys

Aiming- Mouse

Shooting- Left mouse button

CREDITS

All assets were generated by AI 

Music- http://computoser.com

Sprites- https://www.craiyon.com

Title- https://app.inferkit.com/demo
